title: New: Maria Kelly – Hollow
body:
There’s definitely something in the Irish water at the moment, with the Emerald Isle producing a substantial number of fantastic songwriters over the course of the past couple of years.

Drawing inspiration from the likes of Lisa Hannigan and Regina Spektor, **Maria Kelly’s** intimate, heartfelt songwriting really hits home on latest single _Hollow_. Self-arranged, it’s a deeply moving, tender listen, and one of this years most beautiful moments. Check it out below.
